title: A palm tree planted for you in Paradise (Repeat 100x)
meaning: Glorified is Allah, the Most Greatest and praised is He.

title: Your scales will be tipped on the Day of Judgment, full of rewards!
For energy, optimism, spiritual strength and good memory
meaning: I seek the protection of Allah from Satan the outcast

title: The most beloved words to Allah
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَ لاَ اِلهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَ اللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation: Subhaanallaahi, walhamdu lillaahi, wa laa ‘ilaaha ‘illallaahu wallaahu ‘Akbar
meaning: Glory be to Allah and praise be to Allah and there is no god but Allah and Allah is Supremely Great!

title: When you say this Dhikr, sins fall off of you like leaves off of trees.
arabic: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَلاَ إِلَهَ إِلاَّ اللَّهُ وَاللَّهُ أَكْبَرُ وَلاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّ
translation: SubhanAllah wal hamdulillah, wa la ilahaillAllah wa Allahu akbar wala hawla wala quwwata illa billah
meaning: I praise Allah (or All Praise if to Allah) above all attributes that do not suit His Majesty. All praise is for Allah. There is no deity worthy of worship besides Allah. Allah is Great.

title: Say this once to be blessed ten times
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ وَسَلِّمْ عَلَى نَّبينا مُحَمَّد
translation: Allahumma salli wa sallim ‘alaa nabiyyinaa Muhammadin
meaning: O Allah, please send your blessings and peace on our Prophet Muhammad

title: A solution for all of your worries
meaning: I seek the forgiveness of Allah and repent to Him.

title: Sayings light on the tongue, heavy on the scales & beloved to the Most Merciful
arabic: سُبْحان الله وَبِحَمْدِهِ وَسُبْحان الله العَظِيم
meaning: I declare Allah free of all imperfections and may He be praised. I declare Allah free of all imperfections, the Mighty.

title: Fills what is between the heavens and earth
meaning: I declare Allah free of all imperfections All praise is for Allah

title: When a person sincerely says ‘La ilaha illallah’, the doors of the sky are opened for it until it reaches the Throne so long as he avoids major sins
meaning: There is no god truly worthy of worship except Allah
